long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with the magical 'Minnie Mouse New Tab' extension! Every time you open a new tab, be welcomed by the timeless elegance of Minnie Mouse as she appeared in the 1920s.

This charming extension adds a touch of nostalgia and happiness to your daily internet adventures. The classic animations of the adored mouse will not only lift your spirits but also give your browser a distinctive and elegant look. Experience the enchantment of the era when Minnie first won hearts across the globe. Simple to install and absolutely enchanting to use, 'Minnie Mouse New Tab' is ideal for Disney enthusiasts and aficionados of all things classic. Introduce a dash of old-school Disney magic to your day, every day! This extension also updates your default search engine and your search engine on the New Tab to Microsoft Bing.
